page.title: 07People of Maesbrook Village
page.content: In our group we asked some people of Maesbrook some questions about what they thought of the village and the surrounding towns. These are the main answers we got. Most of the people we interviewed had lived in Maesbrook for over ten years and most of them were in their gardens when we met them. They thought that it was a pretty and peaceful place to live. However it had got busier and traffic used it as a short cut past Oswestry. None of them would really prefer to live anywhere else. A few of them went to church in Maesbrook and one woman did decorating there. Not many went to the Blackhorse pub, they preferred to go to other pubs outside the area.
